import bpy
tongue_vertices = [6051, 6052, 6053, 6054, 6055, 6056, 6057, 6058, 6059, 6060, 6061, 6062, 6063, 6064, 6065, 6066, 6067, 6068, 6069, 6070, 6071, 6072, 6073, 6074, 6075, 6076, 6077, 6293, 6294, 6295, 6296, 6297, 6360, 6361, 6362, 6478, 6479, 6484, 6485, 6486, 6487, 6488, 6489, 6490, 6491, 6492, 6493, 6494, 6495, 6496, 6497, 6498, 6499, 6500, 6501, 6505, 6506, 6507, 6508, 6509, 6510, 6511, 6512, 6754, 6755, 6756, 6757, 6758, 6759, 6760, 12863, 12864, 12865, 12866, 12867, 12868, 12869, 12870, 12871, 12872, 12873, 12874, 12875, 12876, 12877, 12878, 12879, 13080, 13081, 13082, 13083, 13084, 13128, 13129, 13130, 13241, 13242, 13246, 13247, 13248, 13249, 13250, 13251, 13252, 13253, 13254, 13255, 13256, 13257, 13258, 13259, 13262, 13263, 13264, 13265, 13266, 13267, 13268, 13269, 13508, 13509, 13510, 13511, 13512, 13513]
for i in tongue_vertices:
	bpy.context.active_object.data.vertices[i].select=True	
bpy.ops.object.editmode_toggle()
